tool_description: API to request information about Languages, Countries and German Citites
name: Locations - Languages, Countries & German Cities
title: Locations - Languages, Countries & German Cities

api_list.name: All German Cities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://locations-languages-countries-german-cities.p.rapidapi.com/cities/de/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "locations-languages-countries-german-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: "All" Languages
api_list.description: List of most of the worldwide languages with the language code, the native language name and the English translation
api_list.code:

url = "https://locations-languages-countries-german-cities.p.rapidapi.com/languages/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "locations-languages-countries-german-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
